import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import './stylesheets/Profile.css' import axios from "axios"; const Profile = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ username: '', avatar: '', }); useEffect(() => { const getUser = async () => { const {data} = await axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/userData', {withCredentials: true}) setUser(data); } getUser(); console.log(user?.username); console.log(user?.avatar); }, []); return (
{user?.username}
